SENT.plain: In a epidemiological study 3840 clerks of state of North Rhein Westfalia were investigated concerning the frequency of atherosklerotic leasions of the carotid and femoral arteries in duplex scanning
17% of all investigated showed independency to age, sex and risk factors alterations of the vessel walls
Men had twice as much plaques as women and male subjects with multiple risk factors had four times more plaques than those without
